properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 2:39PM CST until January 9 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 30 kt shifting south. Gusts up to
40 kt and waves 8 to 13 feet expected.

* WHERE...Southern and central portions of Lake Michigan.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 PM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM CST THURSDAY
